comment: Dr. Thomson is the best option for research methods hands down. You write a research paper on a topic of your choice. But she literally breaks down every aspect of the paper. It may be challenging if you have never written a lit review or annotated bibliography, but she grades very easily and helps so much. Seriously, if she is an option, take her.

I left the class with a 114. This was the most fun I've ever had in a class, the homework was easy, the midterm was easy, the final was easy. There was an extra credit paper that could grant you 100 extra credit points. Overall, it was a great class.

Dr. Thompson is one of the best Professors I've ever had. I had her 3 semesters in a row and she's always been great. I did struggle a bit in two of her classes due to personal issues, but she was very understanding and helped me out to the best of her ability. I love her classes and hope that I can take her in the Senior Seminar class in Fall 2025

If I could take her for every class ever I would. There's many assignments but that means there's a lot of opportunities to get your grade up. She is very relatable and caring, responds to emails in depth and fast. I was scared about taking Research Methods but she makes the writing process very easy and less stressful.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: very very vocal and communicative. did a great job in engaging and discussing class topics, very easy class and was lots of fun too. 10/10 would take again. shes short, young, and friendly. definitly someone i could be friends with.

Professor Thompson is one of the best professors I've ever had! Lectures are super easy, and she loves answering questions. Do your homework and attend class and you'll get an A+. I would recommend Professor Thompson 100x!

My FAVORITE PROFESSOR EVER! I wish I was not limited to what I can write, but Professor Dr. Thompson is caring, inspirational, and motivated to help students absorb knowledge in a way that piques their interest.  I can not say enough that EVERYONE at KSU should be taught by this wonderful professor! She deserves tenure for life!!

The classwork is very essay-heavy since it is a research methods course, but this professor really helped put everything into bite-sized pieces that were easy to manage. She gives really helpful feedback after every assignment and it seems like she wants u to actually succeed. I say its an easy A class bc she gives a lot of chances for u to do well
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring
